name: Video card Clicker
description:
Hello, my friend! This is my new game called "Video card Clicker". In this game you can pump your virtual video card and get a good mood.

[10.12.2020]

Update! Hello, dear fans of the "Clicker" genre. Today I am ready to present you a new update of my game.

Added:

+New Wallpapers for the "Menu" and "Clicker" layer.

+New skins for Video card "VT 620".

+New Fan(blower) texture.

+Displayed text showing the number of coins received per second.

+New design for the "Upgrade" window.

+Full display of the advantages of the selected, Upgrade "upgrade" video card.

Fixed bags:

+Fixed music lagging when starting the game

and more....

Shortcomings at the moment:

-Ads button is not available

-Button of change fans is not available

Thanks for your attention!
